prompt: Design a modern order tracking page with a soft blue background. Display order number '#ORD-2024-006' in a bold header with a purple 'In Transit' status chip. Include a vertical timeline-style progress indicator with 4 stages: Order Placed (completed, green), Processing (completed, green), Shipped (current, purple), and Delivered (pending, gray). Show estimated delivery as 'March 19, 2024'. Add an order summary card with a placeholder image, item name 'Wireless Keyboard', quantity 'Qty: 1', and price '$69.99', styled with a white background and rounded corners. Include a delivery address section for 'Tom Harris', '987 Cedar St, Boston, MA 02108', and phone '+1 (555) 789-1234'. Add a carrier section with 'DHL' and tracking number 'DHL789123456'. Place two buttons at the bottom: a purple 'Track Package' elevated button and a gray 'Contact Support' outlined button. Use consistent spacing, rounded corners, and subtle shadows.
